definition[0]: things painted or written on something, especially something such as an aircraft, road, vehicle etc
example[0]: The marking on the road is unclear.
example[1]: strange markings on the walls of the cave
definition[1]: the coloured patterns and shapes on an animal’s fur, on leaves etc
example[2]: This dolphin is noted for its distinctive black and white markings.
example[3]: the vivid markings of the angelfish
definition[2]: the activity of checking students’ written work
example[4]: I have to do a lot of marking tonight.
example[5]: the setting and marking of exams
